maxSends.title: Maximum sends in window
maxSends.description: Maximum number of sends allowed within the configured time window.

timeWindowSeconds.title: Time window (seconds)
timeWindowSeconds.description: Length of the counting window in seconds (e.g., 10 = 10 seconds).

maxSends.ui:help: Enter a positive integer for how many sends are allowed in the window.

timeWindowSeconds.ui:help: Enter a positive number of seconds for the counting window.
